explains: v. 威胁（menace 的 ing 形式）；恐吓

sentences.en: Sarah made a menacing gesture with her fist.
sentences.cn: 萨拉用拳头做了个威胁的手势。

sentences.en: Their noise modulated to a concerted menacing growl punctuated by sharp yaps.
sentences.cn: 它们的喧闹声逐渐变为整齐划一的、带有威胁性的吼叫，还夹杂着刺耳的狂吠。

sentences.en: At night, the dark streets become menacing.
sentences.cn: 在夜晚，漆黑的街道变得阴森森的。
